title: The Journey of a Chicana Student at UCLA

items.title: Resources
items.summary: For any mixed student struggling with their identity and perceived fraudulence: Resources at UCLA Bruin Resource Center: https://brc.ucla.edu UCLA Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion Center: https://equity.ucla.edu Mixed Student Union: https://community.ucla.edu/studentorg/1237 Here is Yuliana Barrón Perez's 2022 Commencement speech that encourages higher education: General Resources Mixed Teens…
items.content_html:
For any mixed student struggling with their identity and perceived fraudulence:

Resources at UCLA

  • Bruin Resource Center: https://brc.ucla.edu
  • UCLA Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion Center: https://equity.ucla.edu
  • Mixed Student Union: https://community.ucla.edu/studentorg/1237 
  • Here is Yuliana Barrón Perez's 2022 Commencement speech that encourages higher education:

General Resources

  • Mixed Teens in America: https://www.parents.com/parenting/better-parenting/teenagers/what-its-like-to-grow-up-biracial-in-america-today/
  • The Mixed Experience in American: https://www.vox.com/first-person/21734156/kamala-harris-mixed-race-biracial-multiracial 
  • Resources to explore identity questions: https://socialworklicensemap.com/blog/resources-explore-multicultural-identity-mixed-race-families/#first-person-perspectives

items.title: About Me
items.summary: Sofia Villalpando Hi! Thank you so much for visiting my site and reading my story. I truly appreciate your time. I am a 19 year old junior at the University of California, Los Angeles and I am from Oceanside, California. I am majoring in Statistics…
items.content_html:
Sofia Villalpando

Hi! Thank you so much for visiting my site and reading my story. I truly appreciate your time. I am a 19 year old junior at the University of California, Los Angeles and I am from Oceanside, California. I am majoring in Statistics and minoring in Digital Humanities while being actively involved as a Bruin Ambassador, Learning Assistant, a Data Journalist for Bruin Sports Analytics, and participated in the UCLA Triathlon team for two years. 

Future Project

Using this website, I will be further examining how mixed students...

items.title: Life of a mixed student: The Journey of a Chicana Student at UCLA
items.summary: Welcome! My name is Sofia Villalpando and I am a Mexican-American (Chicana) student who attends UCLA. For more information about me, you can visit my About Me page or my LinkedIn profile! UCLA has announced that they aim to become a Hispanic Serving Institution (HSI)…
items.content_html:
Welcome! My name is Sofia Villalpando and I am a Mexican-American (Chicana) student who attends UCLA. For more information about me, you can visit my About Me page or my LinkedIn profile! 

Background

 

 

My experience at UCLA as a Hispanic Serving Institution

UCLA has announced that they aim to become a Hispanic Serving Institution (HSI) by 2025
